Key Arguments: The legislation threatens free speech and democracy.
There is skepticism about who will employ and oversee fact-checkers.
The government has previously spread misinformation, particularly regarding COVID-19 vaccines.
What was initially labeled as misinformation during the pandemic was later proven true.
The legislation is seen as a government overreach and an attempt to control debate.
Notable Quotes: This piece of legislation scares the living day lights out of me and it should scare you too.
The Government have been the biggest perpetrators for spreading misinformation and yet if this legislation gets approved, they will be exempt from it.
This orwelian piece of legislation is all about the Government trying to control debate so they can control legislation.
